mapper.select:
select ,
from td_ui_button left join td_ui_button_image buttonImage on td_ui_button.image_id = buttonImage.image_id where td_ui_button.button_id=#{id}

select ,
,a.button_name display_name from td_ui_button inner join td_ui_list_button a on a.button_id=td_ui_button.button_id left join td_ui_button_image buttonImage on td_ui_button.image_id = buttonImage.image_id where a.list_id=#{listId}

select ,
,a.button_name display_name from td_ui_button inner join td_ui_view_button a on a.button_id=td_ui_button.button_id left join td_ui_button_image buttonImage on td_ui_button.image_id = buttonImage.image_id where a.view_id=#{viewId}
